description: This Java class defines the Asset domain model for a media resource (image, icon) used in pictograms. It is annotated as a MongoDB document with indexing, contains fields for asset metadata, and includes constructors, getters, and setters.
published: public Asset(String name, String url, String type, long sizeBytes, String ownerId)

classes.name: Asset
classes.description: Represents a media resource (image, icon) used in pictograms, stored as a MongoDB document with validation and indexing annotations.

methods.name: Asset
methods.description: Constructor to initialize an Asset with specified properties.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the asset.

methods.name: getUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL associated with the asset.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Returns the type of the asset (e.g., image, icon).

methods.name: getSizeBytes
methods.description: Returns the size of the asset in bytes.

methods.name: getOwnerId
methods.description: Returns the owner ID of the asset.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the asset.

methods.name: setUrl
methods.description: Sets the URL of the asset.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Sets the type of the asset.

methods.name: setSizeBytes
methods.description: Sets the size of the asset in bytes.

methods.name: setOwnerId
methods.description: Sets the owner ID of the asset.
